title: What is the function of the virtual private network VPN setting and how should it be set?
answer:
VPN is defined as the establishment of a temporary and secure connection via a [public network](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E5%85%AC%E7%94%A8%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank)(usually the [Internet](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E5%9B%A0%E7%89%B9%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank)), which is a secure and stable tunnel that passes through the disordered [public network](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E5%85%AC%E7%94%A8%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank). A [Virtual Private Network](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E8%99%9A%E6%8B%9F%E4%B8%93%E7%94%A8%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank) is an extension of the enterprise intranet. A [Virtual Private Network](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E8%99%9A%E6%8B%9F%E4%B8%93%E7%94%A8%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank) can help [remote users](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E8%BF%9C%E7%A8%8B%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank), corporate [offices](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E5%88%86%E6%94%AF%E6%9C%BA%E6%9E%84&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank), business partners and suppliers establish a reliable secure connection with the company's intranet, and ensure the security of data transmission. A [Virtual Private Network](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E8%99%9A%E6%8B%9F%E4%B8%93%E7%94%A8%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank) can be used for the growing global [Internet](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E5%9B%A0%E7%89%B9%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank) access for mobile users in order to achieve a secure connection; it can be used for a virtual private line that implements secure communications between [business websites](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank), and used for the cost-effective connection to business partners' and users' secure [extranet](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E5%A4%96%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank) virtual private network.   
 VPN can provide features as follows: [The firewall](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E9%98%B2%E7%81%AB%E5%A2%99&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank) feature, authentication, encryption and channelization can help establish a private [communications line between two or more business intranets in different places on the Internet through a special encrypted communication protocol](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E9%80%9A%E8%AE%AF%E5%8D%8F%E8%AE%AE&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank), which is like mounting a private line, but it does not require actually laying a physical line like an [optical cable](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E5%85%89%E7%BC%86&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank). This is like applying for a private line to the Telecommunication Bureau, but requires neither the payment of the costs of laying the line nor buying routers and other hardware devices.[ VPN technology](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=VPN%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank) is originally one of the most important techniques with the router, and the software for [switches](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E4%BA%A4%E6%8D%A2%E6%9C%BA&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank), [firewall](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E9%98%B2%E7%81%AB%E5%A2%99&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank) devices or Windows 2000 also supports the VPN functionality. In a word, the core of VPN lies in the establishment of a virtual private network with the [public network](http://zhidao.baidu.com/search?word=%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E7%BD%91&fr=qb_search_exp&ie=utf8%22 \t %22_blank). 

 Step 1: On the home screen, click Settings>More...>VPN to set the screen PIN code, as shown in the figure 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110057)

 Step 2: Select the + above to add a virtual private network, as shown in the figure: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110058)

 Step 3: Select "Add a Virtual Private Network" for configuration, with the type of PPTP, edit VPN's server address, and confirm to save, as shown in the figure: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110059) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110060)

 Step 5: Enter the already set VPN to log in to the account, as shown in the figure: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110061)

 Step 6: Input the account and password, and then click "Connect", the flag for successful connection is the icon with a key in the status bar, and "Connected" is displayed under the account, as shown in the figure. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110062)
